description.narrative: The original PDO is to improve access to and, quality and equity of education. No changes to the PDO are proposed in therestructuring.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V - effectiveness; termination | Description :The Grant Agreement has been executed and delivered andall conditions precedent to its effectiveness or to the right of the Recipient to make withdrawals under it have been fulfilled |Due Date :18-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Article V - effectiveness; termination | Description :The Recipient has furnished to the Association, in formand substance satisfactory to the Association, an Annual Action Plan for Fiscal Year 2011. | Due Date :18-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Grant Agreement Schedule 2 Section I.B.3. | Description :The Recipient shall appoint, not later than March 30,2016, and thereafter retain for the duration of the Project, an Independent Verification Agent having qualifications and terms ofreference acceptable to the World Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Grant Agreement Schedule 2 Section I.B.3. | Description :The Recipient shall report on the achievement of theDisbursement Linked Indicators, not later than March 30 of each year during the implementation of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section I.D. Dates Covenant | Description :The Recipient shall engage in accordance with theprovision of Section III of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement and thereafter maintain, one and no more than 5 IVAs within 6months after effectiveness date. | Due Date :26-Aug-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section IV.B. Withdrawal Conditions; withdrawal period | Description :No withdrawals shall be made:under Category 2 of the disbursement table under Section IV.A.2 of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement until (i) the ECDImplementation Manual has been furnished to the Association, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association; | Due Date:28-Dec-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section IV.B. Withdrawal Conditions; withdrawal period | Description :No withdrawals shall be made:under Category 2 of the disbursement table under Section IV.A.2 of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement until (ii) with respect toa selected Province, except for the first payment of up to 30% of the contract to each TPP, the IVA for such Province has beenhired in a manner satisfactory to the Association, as provided under Section I.D. of Schedule 2 of the FA. | Due Date :28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section V. Other Undertakings: Dated Covenant | Description :Except as the Association may otherwiseagree, the Recipient shall establish a unit within DNEP to oversee pre-school activities and shall ensure that similar functionsareabsorbed by existing staff at provincial and district level by no later than 12 months after Effective Date. | Due Date:26-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2.Section VI.B. Withdrawal Conditions; Withdrawal period | Description :Starting in 2012, no withdrawalcan be made until both the Annual Action Plan and the Annual Action Plan Expenditures have been furnished to the association. |Frequency :Yearly
